mapper.select: SELECT a.memberSeq ,a.memberName ,a.birthday ,a.memberPhone ,a.codeNumber ,a.addrDetail ,a.roadName ,b.member_seq as memberSeqF ,b.bkCheckin ,b.bkCheckout ,b.bkAdult ,b.bkChild ,b.bkTotalPrice ,c.roomName ,c.roomTypeCD ,c.roomPrice ,c.roomRegDate ,c.roomSeq ,b.roomDetail_roomSeq as roomSeqF ,c.hotelList_seq as hotelListSeqF FROM member a LEFT JOIN hotelbooking b on b.member_seq = a.memberSeq LEFT JOIN roomdetail c on b.roomDetail_roomSeq = c.roomSeq WHERE 1=1 AND a.memberSeq = #{memberSeqF}
SELECT a.memberSeq ,a.memberName ,a.birthday ,a.memberPhone ,a.codeNumber ,a.addrDetail ,a.roadName FROM member a WHERE 1=1 AND a.memberSeq = #{memberSeqF};

SELECT a.member_seq as memberSeqF ,c.roomName ,c.roomPrice ,c.roomTotalRating FROM wishlist a LEFT JOIN member b on a.wishSeq = b.memberSeq LEFT JOIN roomDetail c on a.wishSeq = c.roomSeq WHERE member_seq = #{memberSeqF};

SELECT b.bookingSeq ,a.memberSeq ,a.memberName ,a.birthday ,a.memberPhone ,b.member_seq as memberSeqF ,b.bkCheckin ,b.bkCheckout ,b.bkAdult ,b.bkChild ,b.bkTotalPrice ,b.payType ,b.cardNumber ,b.cardDate ,b.cardYear ,b.cardCcv ,c.roomName ,c.roomTypeCD ,c.roomPrice ,b.singleRoomPrice ,b.doubleRoomPrice ,b.twinRoomPrice ,c.roomSeq ,b.roomDetail_roomSeq as roomSeqF ,c.hotelList_seq as hotelListSeqF FROM member a LEFT JOIN hotelbooking b on b.member_seq = a.memberSeq LEFT JOIN roomdetail c on b.roomDetail_roomSeq = c.roomSeq WHERE 1=1 AND b.bookingSeq = #{bookingSeq}
